Extn ; 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) af-5 Wa 6, Hrr-10, ERVT, 7$ f7iit-110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/258/05-06/CMD CO/ Verification/ Vijayawada 7th 2007 CIRCULAR No. 90 The following officials, who are the employees of DGR sponsored Ex-servicemen user fee collecting agencies, MS Ameeta Ashish Security and M/s Group-3 Security respectively and worked at Toll Plazas Vempadu and Agnampudi, are black listed for any future employment directly or indirectly connected with NHAI, either with service providers, contractors or with the consultants- Shri D, V.
